definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Adar is prince, As. Adar-malik (?) v. KAT:2 284, cf, ABK:140; or A. is Counsellor, Decider, cf. Dl:K 52 f; otherwise Sayce:Rel. Bab. 7; on Bab. god Adar v. Schr:KSGW 1880, 19 f Dl:K 52 f, but Sayce:Rel, Bab. 151 f; Jen:Ko 457 f al. rd. As. name Ninib; on Carth. [[יתנאדר]] v. Bae:Rel. 54)
